entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Maple Plains
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to rain this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
